Play:
The Amorous Courier
(Keisei koibikyaku / 傾城恋飛脚)

Written By: Suga Sensuke (菅専助) , Wakatake Fuemi (若竹笛躬)

First Staged: 1773

Reference: Kokuritsu Gekijō jōen shiryōshū, edited by Kokuritsu Gekijō Geinō Chōsashitsu, vol. 158; December 1978' Bunraku January 1989 Performance Program

– Click image to view.

Performances:

September 1969: The Amorous Courier

November 1971: The Amorous Courier

September 1976 Kōkōsei no tame no Bunraku Kyōshitsu: The Amorous Courier

December 1978: The Amorous Courier

January 1989: The Amorous Courier

December 1990: The Amorous Courier

December 1991 Bunraku Kanshō Kyōshitsu: The Amorous Courier

January 1996: The Amorous Courier

September 1972 Bunraku Kyōshitsu: The Amorous Courier

Characters:

Chuzaburo's wife (Chuza's wife) (Chūza nyōbō / 忠三女房)

Hachiemon (Hachiemon / 八右衛門)

Chubei (Kameya Chūbei / 亀屋忠兵衛)

Umegawa (Keisei (Yūjo, Tsuchiya) Umegawa / 傾城(遊女, 槌屋) 梅川)

Mizuemon (Hinokuchi no Mizuemon / 樋の口の水右衛門)

Dengababa (Dengababa / 伝が婆)

Okizukin (Okizukin / 置頭巾)

Tojibei (Tsurukake no Tōjibei / 弦掛の藤治兵衛)

Doan (Haritate no Dōan / 道庵)

Magoemon (Oya Magoemon / 親孫右衛門)

Chief constable (Torite kogashira / 捕手小頭)

Constables (Torite / 捕手)
